idea-plugin.name: Clear Cache
idea-plugin.description:
Your project's cache will be stored in your .gradle folder. To remove your caches you have to traverse through the folders, which is really a time consuming activity. An Idea to automate these process paved way for this plugin. Below are the steps to remember after installation.

  • After installation, do not forget to restart your android studio.
  • Now you would see one more item added in the tools menu named as Clear Cache.
  • If you select the Clear Cache menu item a popup will be displayed.
  • You will get all the packages with the package prefix given.
  • Select the package/packages to delete and click delete.
  • See Github for more details.
